website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Ignite Limitless SR was well-liked by most of its purchasers. Its affordable price, appealing looks, and comfortable underfoot cushioning were highlighted. Inversely, the durability of this neutral shoe wasn’t appreciated by runners who complained of early material breakdown. The width profile was also in contention as some believed it to be correct while others felt that it was loose.
pros: The design of the Puma Ignite Limitless SR was lauded by many shoe-enthusiasts
Many considered the price of this shoe to be affordable
The heel section of the platform helped the upper in supporting the foot and keeping it in place, a consumer noted
The width profile of this running shoe agreed to the expectations of many testes
The upper unit was breathable, several people observed
cons: The durability of the materials wasn’t really appreciated
people had seen the upper and outsole wearing off after only a few uses
A disgruntled consumer claimed that the upper offered a very loose fit

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are a little tight for me, I wear a 12-14 depending on the brand, and I guess my feet are on the longer side and I live in NYC where I walk everywhere. I don't like shoes that don't have a tongue, and I especially don't like how much I have to loosen the laces to make this one fit. I can get my foot in and out without much hastle, but the laces are cutting into my feet a little too much and it gets uncomfortable. They're okay for walking/running but I would not play sports in them.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Durable, light, good color
customer_reviews.text: They are durable & the right shade of red. I find that the front of my foot where it meets the opening gets red and irritated from rubbing against it. It's only after wearing them for a few hours though. Otherwise, it's a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JenaFay

customer_reviews.title: Laces piece broke in 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes. They look cool and are comfortable. The issue is 3 weeks or so after purchased and worn just to school everyday- the rubber part where the shoe laces connect in Started coming unsew and fell off so now the shoes have no laces. There is no where to put the laces in now. Luckily my son can still wear them without laces.
customer_reviews.author: Paeschley

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because I enjoyed the white Puma's i got awhile ago in Canada. they're breathable and lightweight, but still stylish and not too form fitting like Nike's.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: they are super nice and cool but for long walks is no comfortable
customer_reviews.author: jose l. vilcapoma

customer_reviews.title: No arch support
customer_reviews.text: Could just be the shoe being brand new or not. They make my feet hurt really bad and can only withstand to walk in them for only a couple hours. I’ve had them a week. Very little cushion or arch support. Also very heavy shoe. Other than that I love the design of the show every cute shoe.
customer_reviews.author: alyssagolden

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: The product came a bit bigger then expected. But that could've been my fault. I order an 8 but based on the fit I could use 7. Beyond that the quality of the shoes are great that's why I have it 5 stars. The material and comfort was nice. I would advise you to purchase just be accurate of your size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!

customer_reviews.text: The sneakers look nice just as seen.My only issue is i wanted a black sneakers i could walk in all day and this one was uncomfortable after about 4 hours.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but...
customer_reviews.text: Great and sporty shoes. Love the design. However, after a few weeks of usage, the plastic clip sewn into the shoe was torn off when I went to tie my laces. Extremely disappointed given how much I paid for them.

customer_reviews.title: The sneakers are comfortable and protect my feet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are comfortable and protect my feet perfectly. In the other hand I do not know why puma made them this heavy. If you're used to really lightweight sneakers skip these. And they're good with joggers and skinny jeans. No straight pants

customer_reviews.title: Showed up with a nasty stain (white shoes) 🤮
customer_reviews.text: I’m just a little upset that my shoes had a stain on them when they arrived. I’m unsure who to contact or anything. I haven’t bought pumas for a long time and they look super nice but this stain is very unpleasant on a pair of white shoes.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality shoe! Size fit perfectly and it's a slip on which I love! They where a bit uncomfortable at first but after breaking them in they are great! Would definitely buy again highly recommended

product_meta.title: Puma Men's Ignite Limitless Sr Sneaker
product_meta.description: Introducing the all new ignite limitless sr. this style exceeds expectations with an impressive evolution of the street running concept. the tooling is equipped with a new intuitive cushioning system using our proprietary ignite foam. the upper provides a dynamic fit by combining a bootie construction with a free floating TPU lacing system. the unique, sharp collar shape gives this silhouette a never before seen look.
